div.bibl: The Reform Advocate, wk. of Sept. 4, 1891. [THE SABBATH SCHOOL REORGANIZED]

body.p: The School Board of Sinai Congregation announces that the Sabbath School will be entirely re-organized for the incoming season.
There will be five classes - the Confirmation class under the tuition of Dr. E. G. Hirsch - First Grade under Professor Cohn - Second Grade, under Professor Bamberger - Third Grade under Mrs. Nathan.
